title: 9/1 - Spacious + Freshly Painted 2 Bed near Beacon St in Brighton!
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $2,000 / Month
Beds: 2
Bath: 1
Available Date: 09/01/2022
Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water
Parking:: street parking
*9-Month Lease*
In the Heart of Cleveland Circle!
Available for a lease start date of Sept 1st!
(Unit will be cleaned and painted before move-in)
Incredible Location!

Enormous, Well-Maintained, and Updated 2 Bedroom/1 Bath on the garden level with over 1,000 square feet of living space located on the garden level of a quiet, professionally managed building on Ayr Road, in the Cleveland Circle neighborhood of Brighton, just steps from Brookline.
The C-Line is around the corner on Beacon St, and it's only 5-6 minutes walking distance to B & D-Lines.
This neighborhood is considered a Walker's Paradise - Scoring 80 out of 100 for a Walk Score.

The apartment features laminate flooring throughout, a large foyer with mud room, a spacious living room with bay windows, a large eat-in kitchen with full-size appliances, two large bedrooms, ample closet space, and a fully tiled bathroom.
The rent includes heat, hot/cold water, and there are laundry facilities and indoor bike storage on site.
- Professionally Managed
- Garden Level Apartment (Private Entrance)
- Freshly painted and cleaned before the start of the lease
- Square footage is approximately 1,034 (See Floor Plan)
- Conveniently located near the B, C, and D Lines (*See Public Transit Below*)
- Steps from the C-Line on Beacon St
- Right by the Chestnut Hill Reservoir
- Laundry facilities on site
- Indoor bike storage
- Free on-street parking with a residential sticker
- Off-street parking available for $175-200/month
- The rent includes heat and hot/cold water
Public Transit
- C-Line at Englewood Station is just a 1-minute walk
- 6-minutes walking distance to the D-Line at Reservoir Station
- 6-minutes walking distance to the B-Line at Chestnut Hill Ave
- 4-minutes walking distance to the 51 & 86 Bus Stop
null
